title: [BUG] Old shop bug
body:
• **Server:** EUW
• **Type of Bug:** client bug
• **Description:** Old shop got opened
• **Video / Screenshot:** https://i.imgur.com/hn9jIub.jpg https://i.imgur.com/i7HUMtd.png
• **Reproduction steps:** 1. Open the client. 2. Return to home. 3. Click on one of the Skin / Champ Icons there. 4. Success
• **Expected result:** New shop should get opened
• **Observed result:** Old shop gets opened
• **Reproduction rate:** 10/10 happens every time.

Its not Game Breaking, but still a bug!
